title: Why no URF scheduled for the holidays?
body:
Is it just me or does it strike you as weird that URF is not scheduled for the holidays/Uni break?
URF is much loved by the league community and in the Uni/holiday break when league lovers can finally play in absence of study/school/work their favourite game mode is not scheduled. Do you agree that URF should have been scheduled?
Answer in the poll below!
